mapper.select: select f.board_id , f.member_id, f.member_nickname , f.board_title , f.board_update_date, f.board_register_date , f.board_read_count , ifnull(l.like_count, 0) board_like_count, r.reply_count board_reply_count from ( select f.board_id , f.member_id, m.member_nickname , f.board_title , f.board_update_date, f.board_register_date , f.board_read_count from tbl_board_saving f left outer join tbl_member m on f.member_id = m.member_id group by board_id ) f left outer join ( select l.board_id, count(l.board_like_id) like_count from tbl_board_saving_like l group by l.board_id ) l on l.board_id = f.board_id left outer join ( select r.board_id, ifnull(count(r.reply_id),0) reply_count from tbl_board_saving_reply r group by r.board_id ) r on r.board_id = l.board_id group by board_id order by board_id desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
